channel.title: Few questions?
channel.description: 1. How do you lower the ammount of xp given by something such as wcing, hitting dummies and such? 2. How do i change the ammount of money given by something such as when you cut a tree? 3. What can i do to stop massers, cause when you click it keeps clicking by itself?

item.title: Few questions?
item.dc:creator: @ballin2005 ballin2005
item.description:
@ballin2005 wrote:

When i pull the lever i get defense xp, but it says “you pull the lever and gain defense xp” i cant find that.[br][size=1]Posted on: October 07, 2007, 10:20:33 AM[/size][hr]In client.java zamorack statue aint there…[br][size=1]this is all i find on zamorak statue in client.java

case 2874: // Zamorak Statue ObjTrain("strike at", 1833, "Zamorak statue", "strength", 2, 995, 1000); break;[br][size=1]Posted on: October 07, 2007, 10:51:17 AM[/size][hr]Still ahvent figuited it out. I’m wondering if its even in client.java?

Read full topic

item.title: Few questions?
item.dc:creator: @Itachi_Uchiha Itachi Uchiha
item.description:
@Itachi_Uchiha wrote:

[quote=“ballin2005, post:4, topic:149853”]WEre do i search the “method of dummies”?Client.java?[/quote]Yes, search for “dummy”, or “You attack the dummy.”
to stop massers from this just change

actionTimer = 12;

to around 30, 40 or so.

Read full topic

item.title: Few questions?
item.dc:creator: @ballin2005 ballin2005
item.description:
@ballin2005 wrote:

WEre do i search the “method of dummies”?Client.java?

Read full topic

item.title: Few questions?
item.dc:creator: @Itachi_Uchiha Itachi Uchiha
item.description:
@Itachi_Uchiha wrote:

  1. Search for the method of dummies, or anything you want, find the line that gives the XP to a players skill x* then change the number before the multiplication(*)
  2. Again search for where it is located then look at the line addItem(“x”); change the number in the quotes
  3. Set up timers for everything that you do not want to be massed.(the method will not recall until the timer reaches back to 0)

Read full topic

item.title: Few questions?
item.dc:creator: @delboi delboi
item.description:
@delboi wrote:

  1. When clicking the object search for what it says i.e “you hit the dummy” and just below that you should see what to do.
  2. dont get what you mean
    3.there are many things to stop massers, auto kick,ban, or action timer/ loop the actiontimer and loop are most effective

Read full topic
